Class MapView

A view object that displays and manages static map content using imagery from the Aeris Maps Platform (AMP).

A MapView instance does not support user interaction in regards to panning and zooming other support for static control elements to reload map content. If you need to support greater user interaction for map panning and zooming, use an instance of Map instead.

setLayers

  • setLayers(layers: MapConfigLayersOptions, legend?: string): void
    • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:264

    Sets the map layers.

    The legend displayed for the specified map layers can be overridden by providing a value for the legend parameter, which can either be an array of layer codes for multiple auto-configured legends, or a single URL string for a single legend image.

    memberof

    MapView

    Parameters

    • layers: MapConfigLayersOptions
    • Optional legend: string

    Returns void

Static Event

Event: object
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1028

Events that can be triggered by a MapView instance.

static
memberof

MapView

CHANGE

CHANGE: string = "change"
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1034

Fired when any map property has changed, such as layers, size, region, etc.

CHANGE_DATA

CHANGE_DATA: string = "change:data"
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1037

Fired when the map weather data layers have changed.

LOAD_DONE

LOAD_DONE: string = "load:done"
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1043

Fired when map data has completed loading.

LOAD_START

LOAD_START: string = "load:start"
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1040

Fired when map data begins loading.

READY

READY: string = "ready"
  • Defined in maps/views/map/MapView.ts:1031

Fired when the map is initialized and rendered.
